Package dev.morphia

Class MorphiaDatastore.DatastoreOperations

java.lang.Object
dev.morphia.MorphiaDatastore.DatastoreOperations
Enclosing class:
dev.morphia.MorphiaDatastore
public abstract static class MorphiaDatastore.DatastoreOperations extends Object
Defines the various operations the driver performs on behalf of a Datastore
